trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Levittown
There was one other sighting in Levittown on or around June 29th 2008
divs: sighting detailsso my fiance & his friend were at st.mikes fair in levittown,pa when his friend stopped to play a shooting game, so i was bored so i just started looking around & i looked right at this orange\white streak going across horizontally, i thought it can't be a plane because it has no contrail behind it & maybe it was a meteor though. i did tell my fiance & his friend to look but it was so fast they couldn't spot it in time & i was like oh wait till it comes out the other side of the clouds & then you'll see it, but it never did, weird !!! & now i just read someone else's story in pa, they saw what i saw but on a different day,somewhere else, so i had to write this in !!!! thankyou
Summary: I was at St.Mikes Fair in Levittown, PA with 2 other people when i looked up & saw bright organge/white streak no contrail, never came out the other side of the clouds
